Control Name: 2.2.5 The workload is implemented with strategies for resiliency and self-healing.
Control Statement: Consider implementing strategies and capabilities for resiliency and self-healing needed to achieve workload availability targets. Programming paradigms such as retry patterns, request timeouts, and circuit breaker patterns can improve application resiliency by automatically recovering from transient faults.
